snippet.title: CGR Undertow - HAMSTER MONOGATARI COLLECTION review for Game Boy Advance
snippet.description:
Hamster Monogatari Collection review. http://www.ClassicGameRoom.com
Shop CGR shirts & mugs! http://www.CGRstore.com
Classic Game Room presents a CGR Undertow review of Hamster Monogatari Collection for Game Boy Advance developed and published by Culture Brain.

Hamster Monogatari Collection compiles three different phases of hamster-centric gaming, one of which isn't actually a game, and one of which is just a new version of the Fantasy Puzzle version of the game we've already seen. "Hamster Monogatari" is just an umbrella term for any hamster-related games produced by Culture Brain, usually smaller-form affairs suitable for inclusion on a compilation like this one, which incorporates that familiar block-moving puzzle game, a monster-training RPG, and a fortune-teller.

This video review features video gameplay footage of Hamster Monogatari Collection for Game Boy Advance and audio commentary from Classic Game Room's TJ.
